doc.title: Machine-Gun Nose
doc.plot: Machine-Gun Nose is about an extraordinary but humble man who has a machine-gun for a nose, and who is caught up in world run by a nightmare bureaucracy. Thrill to the triumph of the human spirit as Machine-Gun Nose engages in an unasked-for fight for freedom and economic security. Will Machine-Gun Nose make it to work at his job as an Unemployment Processor at Analazation Amalgamation Corporation on time? Or will he get fired and be found Liable to be Rendered for Unemployment Processing himself? What is the Robot Cabdriver's mysterious secret?
